column4: Hi guys, quick question about linking libopenal.so.0 to libopenal.so.1. Is it possible to run a program that depends on libopenal.so.0 with libopenal.so.1 ?
i think i created a link using "ln /usr/lib32/libopenal.so.1 /usr/lib32/libopenal.so.0", alas the program still reports the missing lib
unfortunately linking did not solve my problem. Any other suggestions i could follow up?
what ap are you trying to run?
Nope, unfortunately that game is not compatible with the proprietary verison of q3
thats exactly what I did with no luck
wait i think i have made a huge mistake. Let me try something
i realised that im using 64 bit.. and ioquake supports 64. So the 32 bit library was not the problem
